// </auto-generated>

using AnotherECS.Core;

namespace AnotherECS.Gen.Project
{
    public static class SystemInstaller
    {
        private static bool _isNoInstalled = true;

        public static void Install()
        {
            if (_isNoInstalled)
            {
                _isNoInstalled = false;
                InstallInternal();
            }
        }

        private static void InstallInternal()
        {
<#ARRAY [0..SYSTEM:COUNT]#>
            SystemGlobalRegister.Install<<#SYSTEM:NAME#>>(<#INDEX0#>, <#SYSTEM:INJECT_ATTRIBUTES#>);
<#END#>
<#ARRAY [0..SYSTEM:AUTO_ATTACH:COUNT]#>
            SystemAutoAttachGlobalRegister.Install<<#SYSTEM:AUTO_ATTACH:NAME#>>();
<#END#>
        }
    }
}
